Internet Explorer、タブレット、スマホには対応しておりません。: It does not correspond to Internet Explorer, tablet, and smartphone.
PC版のブラウザ （Google Chrome, Edge, FireFox,: PC version of browser (Google Chrome, Edge, FireFox, Opera)
※履歴はPC（端末）ごとに記録されており、ほかの人には見えません。: ※ History is recorded for each PC (terminal), it is not visible to other people.
これまでに作成した卓の履歴: History of conferences created so far
作成した卓はありません。: There is no board that you created.
新しい卓を作り、自分や他の人が参加できる状態にします。: Make a new board so that you and other people can join.
新しい卓を作成しました。下記のURLにアクセスすることで、決闘への参加や観戦が可: A new board is made. You can participate in the battle and watch as you access the URL below.
本文-ふるよにボードシミュレーターとは:
Please use PC browser to play, this is the simulator of boardgame「Sakura Arms」.
You can play against and watch online, and use it to play against your friends. It can also be used for hotseat gaming by opening two screens in one PC.

　But please pay attention that it is just a simulator, not a online matching tool. For this reason, compared to matching tools before, the rules and board management is not so automatic.(Players need to do it by themselves, such as moving cards and Sakura tokens, and decreasing their life when being attacked.)

　In addition, we recommend the use of voice chat, such as discord, to facilitate the match from the above properties.

　If you want to find an opponent, please use the discord server below.

  • ふるよにミカン (Run by ポン / chatting, server with a loosen atmosphere)
  • ふるよに熱帯部屋 (Run by tot/ have a lot of people willing to match. Uses BGEngine.)
本文-現在のバージョン（β版）についての注意:
• In the current beta version, all 14 Megamis in Shinmaku Season 3 is accessible.(Another Megami also included.)（Tutorial Honoka & Utsuro NOT included）
  • Because it is the early access version, it may contain a lot of unfinished parts and bugs.。
  • Development and support will continue until the official digital game version has been released. After that, supports may be cancelled without notice.
本文-連絡先:
Please send us your opinions, requests, impressions and bug reports to any of the following.

  • Twitter of the Author（ポン）
  • Discord server「ふるよにミカン」
  • Request/Bug report post　※Log in is unnecessary
